channel.title: How do I fix this error[PI]
channel.description: Here is the error. [code]------ Compiling ------ .\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:37: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcId2 location: class server.model.players.Client c.npcId2 = 3689 + Misc.random(5); ^ .\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:38: cannot find symbol symbol : variable isNpc location: class server.model.players.Client c.isNpc = true; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code] I don't know where to declare this variable if you could help. Thanks.

item.title: How do I fix this error[PI]
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

As you can see it says “c.isNpc” simply meaning it’s reading from the Client.java file, you need to add it there.

Read full topic

item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

AXE IN LOG = 5581
LOG WITHOUT AXE = 5582
AXE ID = 1351

item.title: How do I fix this error[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Wildy_kingz Wildy kingz
item.description:
@Wildy_kingz wrote:

making it give you an axe is easy (ill post in a few minutes on how to do)
but to make it disappear and be replaced with another item of the similar ordinance when you get the axe then have it reappear will be a bit trickier, ill see if i can find you some help on that

item.description:

Here is the error.

------ Compiling ------ .\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:37: cannot find symbol symbol : variable npcId2 location: class server.model.players.Client c.npcId2 = 3689 + Misc.random(5); ^ .\server\model\players\packets\WearItem.java:38: cannot find symbol symbol : variable isNpc location: class server.model.players.Client c.isNpc = true; ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
I don’t know where to declare this variable if you could help. Thanks.
